actions.committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Workforce Protections.

official_title: To amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to require payment of at least the minimum wage to certain drivers for all hours worked as a condition of exempting such drivers from overtime requirements.
short_title: Hour of Pay for an Hour of Work Act of 2003

summary.text: Hour's Pay for an Hour's Work Act of 2003 - Amends the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to condition an exemption from overtime requirements for certain drivers upon their being paid at least the minimum wage.

titles.title: Hour of Pay for an Hour of Work Act of 2003

To amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to require payment of at least the minimum wage to certain drivers for all hours worked as a condition of exempting such drivers from overtime requirements.
